str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From chora; to place room between, i.e. Part; reflexively, to go away.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To remain, abide, stay, wait; with acc: I wait for, await. A primary verb; to stay.
Unmarried, of a person not in a state of wedlock, whether he or she has formerly been married or not. Unmarried.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To change, exchange, reconcile. From kata and allasso; to change mutually, i.e. to compound a difference.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.
From apo and hiemi; to send forth, in various applications.
A woman, wife, my lady. Probably from the base of ginomai; a woman; specially, a wife.
